sourcesContent:
import React,{useEffect,useState} from 'react' import {Card} from 'react-bootstrap' function Movie({search}) { const [film,setFilm]=useState([]) const getfilm= ()=>{ fetch('data.json').then( response => response.json()).then (movies => setFilm(movies)); } useEffect(()=> {getfilm() },[]) return( search===''? film.map(el=>
{el.Title} {el.Awards} View
): film.filter(el=> el.Title.toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase())).map(el=>
{el.Title} {el.Awards} View
) ) } export default Movie
